name: places/ChIJkfKyfoFZwokRMMCf4k8J5CE
formattedAddress: 7 Cornelia St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Cornelia St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: We got caught in a downpour and stepping into this place and eating all the small tapa style Asian-infused dishes was amazing! This place also had a lot of locals that were just so friendly to us! We had a couple rounds of shots as well since we were a bachelorette party celebration. And the watermelon margaritas were spectacular! Such a delightful flavor! The place has a very eclectic small-feel to it; super fun and again, the food was incredible. Will definitely be returning when back in the area.

originalText.text: Dumplings were delicious! Crab fried rice was very good. Favorite was the tuna and watermelon bbq sashimi. Big portion on the chicken lettuce wrap!

text.text: Dumplings were delicious! Crab fried rice was very good. Favorite was the tuna and watermelon bbq sashimi. Big portion on the chicken lettuce wrap!

originalText.text:
Late snack, so glad i popped in here out of the rain...a cool spot with my favorite rum !!! The firat two bites were from the happy hour menu and totally amazing... Fried Dumpling - crispy and delicious with a kick of sriracha that gives these babies some heat.... next was the pork buns..... pork buns with beautiful crispy crunch in every bite , its a good thing there are 2 per order... final bite was the tuna & BBQ watermelon.... so fresh and light and the smokey taste of the grilled watermelon was definitely a new flavor taste to experience...cant wait to eat it again...

#meecheatsny #unclechopchop
#chelseaeats #nyceats #nycfood #nycfoodie #dumplings

originalText.text:
Uncle Chop Chop serves a delicious and incredibly reasonable happy hour menu all day on Sunday. I’ve been twice now. Both times were excellent.

It doesn’t get busy until 7 or 7:30pm.

The staff, each time I’ve been, shows they value their customers. I love that!

Great food. Neighborhood asset. Love the Happy Hour menu. Great selections for vegetarians!

originalText.text: Great intimate spot! Perfect for dates, laid back yet sophisticated.  The service was excellent. We felt at ease during dinner and the server did a fantastic job. The food was fresh and all the ingredients were combined perfectly.

text.text: Great intimate spot! Perfect for dates, laid back yet sophisticated.  The service was excellent. We felt at ease during dinner and the server did a fantastic job. The food was fresh and all the ingredients were combined perfectly.
